parameterset.name: source
parameterset.parameter:
exit( '
[\033[91m\033[1m'+'ERROR'+'\033[0m'+'] in step \033[1m${jube_step_name}\033[0m:
'+ ' path_to_source needs to be non-empty
'+ ' make sure to set the path in the parameterset "source" in ${jube_benchmark_home}.xml
'+ ' i.e. 
'+ ' <parameterset name="source" init_with="defaults.xml">
'+ ' \033[93m<parameter name="path_to_source" type="string"> \033[1m<PATH TO SOURCE>\033[0m\033[93m </parameter> <--------------\033[0m
'+ ' </parameterset>' ) if '${path_to_source}'=='' else 'OK'

parameterset.name: platform_specs_pset
parameterset.parameter: printf "EXECUTION VERIFICATION CHECK: ";if grep -q "\[MUST-REPORT\] Error.*race" job.out || grep -q "^srun: error:" job.err; then echo "FAILURE"; else echo "SUCCESS"; fi

parameterset.name: compile_pset
parameterset.parameter: if ${force_compilation} || [ ! -f "${benchmark_build_dir}/${executable_full_name}" ]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi

{"base": "MPICC='mpicc ${compile_flags}' MPICXX='mpicxx ${compile_flags}' MPIFC='mpifc ${compile_flags}'", "parcoach": "MPICC='${PARCOACHCC} --wrap-target mpicc ${compile_flags}' MPICXX='${PARCOACHCXX} --wrap-target mpicxx ${compile_flags}'", "tsan": "MPICC=\"${MUSTCC} --wrap-target mpicc ${compile_flags}\" MPICXX=\"${MUSTCXX} --wrap-target mpicxx ${compile_flags}\" MPIFC=\"${MUSTFC} --wrap-target mpif90 ${compile_flags}\"", "tsan-opt": "MPICC=\"${MUSTCC} --wrap-target mpicc ${compile_flags}\" MPICXX=\"${MUSTCXX} --wrap-target mpicxx ${compile_flags}\" MPIFC=\"${MUSTFC} --wrap-target mpif90 ${compile_flags}\"", "tsan-cover": "MPICC=\"${MUSTCC} --wrap-target mpicc ${compile_flags}\" MPICXX=\"${MUSTCXX} --wrap-target mpicxx ${compile_flags}\" MPIFC=\"${MUSTFC} --wrap-target mpif90 ${compile_flags}\"", "isl": "MPICC=\"${MUSTCC} --wrap-target mpicc ${compile_flags}\" MPICXX=\"${MUSTCXX} --wrap-target mpicxx ${compile_flags}\" MPIFC=\"${MUSTFC} --wrap-target mpif90 ${compile_flags}\""}.get("${compile_mode}", 'invalid-compile-mode')

{"base": "", "tsan": "CXX='${MUSTCXX}' CFLAGS='${compile_flags}' CXXFLAGS='${compile_flags}'", "tsan-opt": "CXX='${MUSTCXX}' CFLAGS='${compile_flags}' CXXFLAGS='${compile_flags}'", "tsan-cover": "CXX='${MUSTCXX}' CFLAGS='${compile_flags}' CXXFLAGS='${compile_flags}'", }.get("${compile_mode}", 0)
for item in ${compile_common_env_vars} ${compile_env_vars}; do export "$item"; done

parameterset.name: module_env_pset
parameterset.parameter: module use /home/rwth1269/modules/; module purge; for path in ${use_modules}; do module use $path; done; for modulename in ${required_modules}; do module load $modulename; done

parameterset.name: export_env_pset
parameterset.parameter: for item in ${required_exports}; do export "$item"; done

parameterset.name: cover_config_pset
parameterset.parameter: if ${force_cover_build} || [ ! -f "${cover_cc_bin}" ]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi
if [[ -f "${cover_cc_bin}" ]]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi

parameterset.name: must_config_pset
parameterset.parameter: if ${force_must_build} || [ ! -f "${MUSTRUN}" ]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi
if [[ -f "${MUSTRUN}" ]]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi

parameterset.name: must_build_pset
parameterset.parameter: if [[ $(echo "${must_commit}" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') != "head" ]]; then echo ${must_commit}| awk '{printf $1}'; else git ls-remote ${must_git_clone_ssh} ${must_git_branch} | awk '{printf $1}'; fi

parameterset.name: jube_f294ae0ff0c3c27a7d389c66b32d3697_cover_config_pset
parameterset.parameter: if ${force_cover_build} || [ ! -f "${cover_cc_bin}" ]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi
if [[ -f "${cover_cc_bin}" ]]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi

parameterset.name: jube_70f0eb8b044700a5bbf5ab5c62fc67a3_must_config_pset
parameterset.parameter: if ${force_must_build} || [ ! -f "${MUSTRUN}" ]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi
if [[ -f "${MUSTRUN}" ]]; then echo "1"; else echo "0"; fi

parameterset.name: jube_70f0eb8b044700a5bbf5ab5c62fc67a3_must_build_pset
parameterset.parameter: if [[ $(echo "${must_commit}" | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') != "head" ]]; then echo ${must_commit}| awk '{printf $1}'; else git ls-remote ${must_git_clone_ssh} ${must_git_branch} | awk '{printf $1}'; fi

step.name: build_cover
build_must
compile_cover
compile
